sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Box, Grid, Paper, Typography, Chip, TextField, InputAdornment, IconButton, Button } from "@mui/material"; import SearchIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Search"; import DirectionsRailwayIcon from "@mui/icons-material/DirectionsRailway"; import VisibilityIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Visibility"; const trains = [ { id: "TR-4521", name: "Metro Express 2020", fitness: "Valid", jobs: 2, mileage: "125,430", bay: "A-12", status: "Active" }, { id: "TR-4522", name: "Metro Express 2019", fitness: "Expired", jobs: 5, mileage: "98,750", bay: "M-3", status: "Maintenance" }, { id: "TR-4523", name: "Metro Express 2021", fitness: "Valid", jobs: 1, mileage: "87,250", bay: "B-7", status: "Active" }, { id: "TR-4524", name: "Metro Express 2020", fitness: "Due Soon", jobs: 3, mileage: "112,800", bay: "A-5", status: "Active" }, { id: "TR-4525", name: "Metro Express 2022", fitness: "Valid", jobs: 0, mileage: "112,800", bay: "C-2", status: "Active" } ]; const fitnessColor = { Valid: "success", "Due Soon": "warning", Expired: "error" }; const statusColor = { Active: "success", Maintenance: "warning" }; export default function TrainAudit() { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const [selected, setSelected] = useState(null); const filteredTrains = trains.filter(t => (t.id + t.name).toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) ); return ( Train Audit Comprehensive train profiles and operational status {/* Overview stats */} 4 Active Trains 1 In Maintenance 1 Fitness Expired 11 Pending Jobs $54.4K Ad Revenue {/* Main audit area */} Fleet Overview Complete list of trains with key metrics setSearch(e.target.value)} fullWidth variant="outlined" size="small" placeholder="Search trains..." margin="dense" InputProps={{ startAdornment: ( ), endAdornment: search && ( setSearch("")}> × ) }} /> {filteredTrains.map((train, idx) => ( setSelected(idx)} elevation={selected === idx ? 4 : 1} > {train.id} {train.name} Fitness: Pending Jobs: {train.jobs} Mileage: {train.mileage} Bay: {train.bay} ))} {selected === null ? ( <> Select a Train Click on a train from the list to view detailed information ) : ( <> {trains[selected].id} - {trains[selected].name} Mileage: {trains[selected].mileage} | Bay: {trains[selected].bay} Pending Jobs: {trains[selected].jobs} )} ); }
